 1999-01371999-02-040,  ,  ,  FAIT, 
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign the CONVENTION on the PROVISION of TELECOMMUNICATIONS RESOURCES FOR DISASTER MITIGATION AND RELIEF OPERATIONS, done at Tampere, Finland, on June 18, 1998, or (b) to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing other Canadian officials to sign the Convention on behalf of Canada.
